tweets.text: Please just put an end to this daily Nightmare. @Sotlive @BBCNews @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA https://t.co/VjsDHkS1Av
@SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off Hi - Laura from ITV News here - would it be ok to use your video in our News Bulletin with a credit please?

Devastating new critique of @EnvAgency by @SalmonTroutCons: “All monitored waters in England are polluted with toxic & persistent chemicals, including insecticides and herbicides. Millions of hours of untreated sewage flows are still entering our rivers”
https://t.co/89OXkhNSJV

EA and F-Gas @SjwEnviro @EnvAgency #autorecycling #vehiclerecycling #recycling #vehicledismantling #autodismantling #vehicledepollution #autodepollution #fgas #autosalvage #vehiclesalvage  https://t.co/dX11BMl5L8 https://t.co/UqH0AFzsl8

Our Kent's Magnificent Moths has launched! Working with @NaturalEngland @wccpnews @envagency, this @HeritageFundUK project will help save some of the UK's rarest moths
 
Follow us throughout the day to learn about the species that we’ll work with #magnificentmoths 📸 Ben sale https://t.co/dkhs3dbDmz

@poppers82 @AaronBell4NUL @johncurtinEA @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency Have you read their latest report dated today? March levels generally above WHO Nuisance level but only at danger level 1st weekend of March. No mention of weekend before when they forgot to switch on the machine! @EnvAgency are complicit with @RedIndustries2 without doubt.

Large Dark #Stonefly (Dinocras cephalotes)

Impressive thoracic gills! https://t.co/UfhLKOfJu7

@renton_phil @WandleForum @Feargal_Sharkey @alison_fure @BerrylandsNR @BenGoldsmith @CitizenZoo @LivingWandle @battersea_arts @MjTurner_ @MordenHallPkNT @thameswater @SE_Rivers_Trust @EnvAgency Just sent the Environment Agency an information request to determine how often the sewage works is visited by officers.

@sunnyraisin62 @AaronBell4NUL @johncurtinEA @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency Totally agree. This is damage limitation. A woman who desperately wants to keep her job as the press is getting more intense. She didn’t actually say anything really did she . It was just like a real time version of that letter we all received. I encourage a full investigation

tweets.text:
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Let's not ignore February 2020 when a further 1.25 billion litres of untreated sewage was dumped illegally from Mogden STW into the River Thames
@joe_crowley @rachsalv @leanahosea @Feargal_Sharkey @WindrushWasp @EnvAgency @pow_rebecca @thameswater @SalmonTroutCons https://t.co/Gp9jtlpgdq
Yes. How? How? It is an @EnvAgency EMERGENCY. https://t.co/MDP8UNBDNQ
How is this not on your ‘sort it’ list @PHE_EoEngland @StaffordshireCC ? @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink https://t.co/3LWnCIPZfy
@scottdegg @StinkStopthe @theJeremyVine @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @RedIndustries2 Thank you to all those brilliant callers who have spoken so well on behalf of the whole community today #stopthestink

@paulconnor23 @eddiemair @darrenadam @TomSwarbrick1 I ask myself this everyday, poor regulation from @EnvAgency total mismanagement from @RedIndustries2 in fact a failure to even recognise the landfill is the cause of the stink & now the health concerns grow... it’s like living in the 1800’s #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe

Phase 2 @WildTroutTrust & Kilnsey AC: while we wait for trees to grow/add LWM/shade, we've simulated natural wood fall by pinning/wedging logs. Resulting flow diversity will clean & sort gravel for spawning & @riverflies + fry refugia. Just need water!
#WillTravelForGravel #NFM https://t.co/OC4JyU230G https://t.co/E9dy856KVr

tweets.text: Silverdale stink: 'My house and children's toys all smell of landfill' https://t.co/FQ97OXfYvi

It is 2.30am and the stench that is @RedIndustries2 landfill Whalley's Quarry is permeating our whole flat. This is an environment disaster, a major public and mental health risk. Awake again, and both of us have work tom. @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency #StopTheStink

@hayleysoraya @msm4rsh @Faye_Brookes Campaign leaders in N-u-L have set up a JustGiving fundraiser to buy air purifiers for residents suffering from toxic gas emissions invading their homes from Walleys Quarry Ltd landfill @StoptheStink   https://t.co/2MNYb4tE4c
@EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyAnglia @LeeValleyPark Not a very nice environment to bring up your young #WalthamAbbey #pollution https://t.co/i0D2IbT3aT

tweets.text: We are delighted to be featured in the latest edition of Current Magazine, celebrating the success of the past six years of the @EnvAgency Framework. Read about the Ipswich Tidal Barrier and how our team supported the EA teams in incident response, here: https://t.co/X3fK2gYuVl
